property.name: Description
property.value: At the start of your turn, gain 1 subterfuge. At the end of your turn, lose all subterfuge.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 15 weight, 10 health

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 3 standard wounds to a target if that target has any shadow injuries. Otherwise, deal 2 shadow wounds.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 subterfuge

property.name: Script
property.value: [IF, [GT, [INJURIES, "Shadow", TARGET], 0], [DEAL, "Standard", 3, TARGET], [DEAL, "Shadow", 2, TARGET]]

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 standard wound to a target.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 subterfuge

property.name: Script
property.value: [DEAL, "Standard", 1, TARGET]

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 2 standard wounds to a target if that target has any shadow wounds. Otherwise, deal 1 shadow wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 subterfuge

property.name: Script
property.value: [IF, [GT, [WOUNDS, "Shadow", TARGET], 0], [DEAL, "Standard", 2, TARGET], [DEAL, "Shadow", 1, TARGET]]

property.name: Description
property.value: When you would be dealt at least 2 standard wound, receive 1 less and gain 1 subterfuge. Only active while in Stealth (played a Stealth tactic last turn).

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 weight

property.name: Description
property.value: Subterfuge attacks deal 1 additional shadow wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 5 weight

property.name: Script
property.value: [0, [ON, [CHECKACTION, "Attack", "Subterfuge"], [ADD, [DEALEXTRA, 1, "Shadow"]]]]

property.name: Description
property.value: 1 stamina: Gain 1 subterfuge and gain Stealth until your next turn. You may not use a Stealth tactic this turn.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 weight

property.name: Description
property.value: Lose 1 mana at the beginning of your turn. Aconite may not be cured while you have mana. You may spend 2 mana to convert Aconite to a normal shadow wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 subterfuge, 1 shadow

property.name: Description
property.value: When you cure, convert, or remove an injury (including this one), take 1 standard wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 subterfuge, 1 shadow

property.name: Description
property.value: The first time you attack each turn, take 1 standard wound. Deadly Sumac may not be cured until you attack. You may take 2 standard wounds to convert Deadly Sumac to a normal shadow wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 subterfuge, 1 shadow

property.name: Description
property.value: Your first card played each turn costs 1 additional stamina. Curare may not be cured until you play a card. You may spend 2 stamina to convert Curare to a normal shadow wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 subterfuge, 1 shadow

property.name: Description
property.value: Discard a card from your hand after playing any card. Monkshood may not be cured until you play a card. You may discard 2 cards to convert Monkshood to a normal shadow wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 subterfuge, 1 shadow

property.name: Description
property.value: At the end of your turn, take 1 standard wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 subterfuge, 1 standard

property.name: Description
property.value: Gain Stealth until your next turn, then gain 1 subterfuge and draw a card. You may only play 1 Stealth tactic per turn.

property.name: Description
property.value: Gain Stealth until your next turn, then gain 2 subterfuge. You may only play 1 Stealth tactic per turn.

property.name: Description
property.value: Gain Stealth until your next turn, then gain 1 stamina. You may only play 1 Stealth tactic per turn.

property.name: Description
property.value: At the start of your turn, gain 1 subterfuge. At the end of your turn, lose all subterfuge.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 weight

property.name: Description
property.value: When you receive a standard wound, convert it to a normal shadow wound and convert this injury to a normal shadow wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 shadow

property.name: Description
property.value: Your next attack this turn deals 1 additional wound of each type of wound it deals.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 subterfuge

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 1 shadow wound to a target. Ignore the play cost of your next injury action.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 subterfuge

property.name: Description
property.value: Pick a target with at least 1 shadow injury. Convert up to 3 normal standard wounds to normal shadow wounds.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 subterfuge

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 2 standard wounds to a target. Ignore the play cost of your next injury action.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 subterfuge

property.name: Description
property.value: Pick a target. Use a shadow injury from your hand on that target without replacing a normal shadow wound, but paying its play cost.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 1 subterfuge

property.name: Description
property.value: Pick a target. Gain Stealth and gain 1 subterfuge each time they target you with an attack or spell until your next turn. You may only play 1 Stealth tactic per turn.

property.name: Description
property.value: Pick a target with a shadow injury. Add one of their shadow injuries to your hand, gain its play cost, and give the target a shadow wound.

property.name: Description
property.value: Lose all your subterfuge. Gain Stealth until your next turn, then gain that much subterfuge. You may only play 1 Stealth tactic per turn.

property.name: Description
property.value: Remove up to 2 standard wounds from a target that is not yourself. Gain 1 subterfuge for each standard wound removed this way.

property.name: Description
property.value: Deal 5 standard wounds to a target. May only be played if the target has received a new shadow injury this turn.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 3 subterfuge

property.name: Description
property.value: You may not convert or cure other shadow injuries. When you receive another shadow injury, convert Immunity Lock to a normal shadow wound.

property.name: Cost
property.value: 2 subterfuge, 1 shadow
